（長門）これは少し内気な少女
長門有希の物語
google_translated:
This is a little shy girl
Nagato Yuki story

en_text: Something strange is going on.
jp_text: （キョン）何かが おかしい

en_text: Somehow or another,\NI just get that feeling.
jp_text: 何となく そんな気がした

en_text: Kyon!?
jp_text: （ハルヒ）キョン！

en_text: You're free today, right?
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）
今日 あんた 暇でしょ？

en_text: I didn't even get\Nto say a single word.
jp_text:
（キョン）俺は ひと言も
しゃべっとらんのだが…
google_translated:
I am also a word
I'm sorry ...

en_text: By the way, Kyon-kun.
jp_text: （朝倉）ところで キョン君

en_text: Since summer break's almost over now,\Ndid you remember to do your homework?
jp_text:
夏休みも終わりだけど
ちゃんと宿題 済ませた？

Summer vacation is over
Did you do homework properly?

en_text: Ah...
jp_text: もしも…　いっ…
